services.name: Incident Detection
services.description: Monitoring and identifying potential incidents or anomalies in systems and services.

services.name: Incident Triage
services.description: Assessing and categorizing incidents based on severity and impact.

services.name: Incident Escalation
services.description: Routing incidents to appropriate teams or personnel for further investigation and resolution.

services.name: Incident Communication
services.description: Providing timely and accurate updates to stakeholders during incident response.

services.name: Incident Investigation
services.description: Conducting root cause analysis and in-depth investigation to understand the incident's origin.

services.name: Incident Documentation
services.description: Maintaining detailed records and documentation of incident response activities.

services.name: Incident Reporting
services.description: Generating incident reports to track and analyze incident trends and patterns.
